title: The Beetle
description: Beetles are the largest group of insects, with over 400,000 species worldwide. They have hard wing covers called elytra and are found in nearly every habitat on Earth.

questions.question: What are the hard, protective wing covers of beetles called?
Approximately what percentage of all known insect species are beetles?
What is the life cycle of a beetle called?
Which beetle is known as the strongest animal relative to its size?
What do most adult beetles feed on?
options: All of the above depending on species
questions.correct_answer: All of the above depending on species
